      • convert

        public static double convert(Unit current,
                             Unit target,
                             double value)
        Convert a measurement from current unit into target unit. Pretty darn cool, right?
        Parameters:
        current - the base unit.
        target - the target unit.
        value - the value to convert.
        Returns:
        the converted value.
